name: Haystacks and Needles
description:
This small game is part of the course "Game a Week". As the name suggests I made this in a week. The provided topic was "Find & Click".

This is a hosteast game. The objective is to find the needle in the haystack.

Made by: Benjamin Rose

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game a Week"  (WinterSemester 2019/20
